text.author: Arash Javanbakht
text.title: The Politics of Fear - How it Manipulates Us to Tribalism
text.summary: Psychiatrist Arasht Javanbakht discusses in an essay how fear, which has helped humans to learn from tribemates and survive throughout history, is often illogical, and points out that tribalism and fear are often manipulated by politicians and the media to provoke hate for other groups.
